name: Skyward Pride
desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

values.desc: Increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>8%</color>. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>10%</color>. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>12%</color>. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#99FFFFFF>120%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>14%</color>. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#99FFFFFF>140%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Increases all DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>16%</color>. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#99FFFFFF>160%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.
